app.title: Terpene Explorer
app.tagline: Discover the aromatic world of terpenes

filter.title: Filter by Effects
filter.noResults: No terpenes found matching your filters

search.placeholder: Search terpenes by name, aroma, or effects...
search.label: Search terpenes

error.loadFailed: Unable to load terpene data. Please check your connection and try again.
error.parseFailed: Data format is invalid. Please contact support.
error.validationFailed: Some terpene data is incomplete. Showing available entries.
error.dataFormatError: Data format error. Please open an issue on GitHub: https://github.com/icklers/terpene-explorer/issues
error.noData: No terpene data available. Please add terpene data to the data/ directory and refresh the page.

validation.invalidEntries: {{count}} terpene entry was skipped due to invalid data.
validation.invalidEntries_other: {{count}} terpene entries were skipped due to invalid data.

empty.title: No Terpenes Available
empty.description: No terpene data found. Please add terpene data to the data/ directory.
empty.instruction: Add a terpenes.json or terpenes.yaml file to the /data directory and refresh the page.

loading.pleaseWait: Please wait while we load the data

accessibility.terpeneLabel: {{name}}, a {{aroma}}-scented terpene with {{effects}} effects, found in {{sources}}
